name: Hot Shots - Duck shooter adventure
description:
Duck ahoy! its hunting season in this highly addictive arcade classic duck hunt game!

Load em up and start your jurney right away.

The game is quite simple to understand, basically all you have to do is to choose 1 or 2 ducks
and then you are ready to go, just tap on the screen to shoot the ducks down.

You only got 3 shots per round so aim correctly and fire away!

Collect as many ducks as possible to advance to the next round
